verbose_text: Although research has shown large-scale structural and functional reorganisation of visual cortex as a result of anophthalmia,109, 110 the neurochemical changes underlying cross-modal plasticity remain unclear.109 Incorporating both MRS and MRI, differences in structure and metabolite concentration were investigated in the pericalcarine cortex in anophthalmic patients.109 Results revealed elevated levels of Cho, Cr, Gln, Glu and myo-Inositol relative to sighted controls.
